title: Gig Mindset: Reclaim Your Time, Reinvent Your Career, and Ride the Next Wave of Disruption

highlights.text: This is the essence of the Gig Mindset. Take any task, break it down into steps, and find the experts you need to handle each part. In this instance, you need to do your taxes.
“No matter how brilliant your mind or strategy, if you’re playing a solo game, you’ll always lose out to a team.”

Ask Wonder: How many times have you wasted hours researching topics on your own? Ask Wonder is a pool of professional researchers able to provide information on any topic in a reasonable amount of time.

Writing instructions down isn’t just a benefit to your freelancer. It’s a great exercise for gathering your thoughts and thinking critically. It forces you to consider how to best communicate expectations.
Delegation requires clear communication, guidance, and trust.
